homePage.description: This app will not upload any pictures to the server, all operations are completed locally
homePage.textLabelDescription: Text will be added to the image as a watermark
homePage.textInput: This certificate is only used for handling xx business, and is invalid for other purposes.
homePage.fontLabelDescription: Some languages do not support custom fonts
homePage.textGapDescription: The spacing between text in each line of text
homePage.rowGapDescription: The spacing between each line of text
homePage.saveInfo: $succeedNum image(s) saved, $failedNum image(s) failed to save

exitConfirm.title: Close confirmation
exitConfirm.description: Are you sure you want to close this window?

photos.title: Allow access to your album
photos.description: Please go to your phone Settings to grant $appName the permission to visit your album.

storage.title: Allow access to your storage
storage.description: Please go to your phone Settings to grant $appName the permission to visit your storage.

licenseDialog.licenseDialogContentContent: Protecting user's privacy and personal information is a fundamental principle of $appName.
licenseDialog.licenseDialogContentTip: Below is a list of permissions required by this APP:
licenseDialog.licenseDialogContentPrefix: Before you use this APP's services, please carefully read and agree to the
licenseDialog.licenseDialogContentSuffix: , start using our services after you agree and accept all terms.
iosPermissions: In order to add watermarks to your images, $appName needs access to your Photos. (NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription)
androidPermissions: In order to use the Sentry Service, $appName needs access to your Internet. (android.permission.INTERNET)
In order to add watermarks to your images, $appName needs access to your Storage. (android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE)
In order to save images, $appName needs access to your Storage. (android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE)
In order to add watermarks to your images, $appName needs access to your Photos. (android.permission.READ_MEDIA_IMAGES)

settingsDialog.themesDescription: After turning it on, the dark mode will be turned on or off according to the system
